name: KidGuruRelaxingTherapy
0:
”Alexa, open Kid Guru”
”Alexa, ask Kid Guru to go forward”
”Alexa, ask Kid Guru to go back”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: kid guru
des:
Kid Guru skill helps kids by teaching them basics of yoga and stress reduction techniques. This skill is conducted by an 8 year old and it speaks to the age group that is intended for this skill. Its very simple to use, after starting the skill the user can navigate thru the skill similar to how they would interact with a music player (i.e) move forward, move back, pause etc. At any time the use can say "I am happy" or say "pause" to end the skill.

This skill does not provide medical advice, and is for informational and educational purposes only, and is not a substitute for professional medical advice, treatment or diagnosis. Call your doctor to receive medical advice. If you think you may have a medical emergency, please dial your local emergency response phone number.
